meanings.definition: A print made using the silk-screen process.
meanings.sent1: I bought some colorful serigraphs to decorate my room.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery displayed beautiful serigraphs by local artists.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the stack of serigraphs, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of serigraphs, each memory vivid and distinct.
meanings.sent5: The serigraphs on the wall brightened up the entire room.

meanings.sent1: The artist carefully serigraphs each design onto the fabric.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to serigraph her own t-shirts in art class.
meanings.sent3: The machine hummed softly as it serigraphs the intricate patterns.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to serigraph themselves onto her heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: With steady hands, he serigraphs the image onto the screen with precision.
